value.title: Microsoft Azure: This new developer kit helps to bust the myth that AI is hard
value.excerpt: Microsoft's new Azure Percept Developer Kit aims to make computer vision cheaper and easier, bringing AI to more businesses. The Azure Percept Development Kit (DK) comprises vision (right), optional audio (left) and developer board (middle) modules.

value.title: Microsoft edge AI kit runs Linux on i.MX8M and adds Myriad X and 8MP cam
value.excerpt: Microsoft’s $349 “Azure Percept DK” edge AI kit runs Linux on an i.MX8M and works with Azure IoT services. The kit has a “Vision” module with a 0.7 TOPS Myriad X and an 8MP camera plus an an optional “Audio” module with a 4-mic array.
